Dec. 4, 1983 D Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section A)
Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section A) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest huddersfield-district-bba-december-conte-4825
None
Huddersfield Town Hall, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK Best soloist - euphonium of Holme Silver. 8 bands entered but only three competed.
Aug. 20, 2014, 1:58 p.m. June 27, 2016, 10:06 a.m.
1 Horbury Victoria Band Tom Greatorex
2 Slaithwaite Band Tony Whitaker
3 Holme Silver (Disposables UK Group) Band David Hirst
